duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop applications using Java 8+/J2EE, Spring, Spring-Boot, and RESTful Services
Design and develop Microservices using Spring-Boot and REST API
Experience with ORM Framework - JPA / Hibernate
Knowledge and experience in Docker and Kubernetes
Design and Implement cloud-based solutions in various AWS Services (EC2, IAM, S3, Lambda, etc)
Experience with DevOps tool chain (Jenkins, Artifactory, Maven/Gradle, GIT/BitBucket)
Experience with OAuth implementation using Ping Identity (Nice to have)
Familiarity with API Management (Apigee) and Service Mesh (Istio) (Nice to have)
Experience with Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kibana (Nice to have)
Knowledge and experience in NoSQL (MongoDB) (Nice to have)
Experience with scripting languages using Unix, Python (Nice to have)

education_certification.credential: Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent
